entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of rain except periods of wet snow over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
